title: 96/190/EC: Commission Decision of 22 February 1996 amending Decision 93/24/EEC and Decision 93/244/EEC and concerning additional guarantees relating to Aujeszky's disease for pigs destined to regions free of the disease in Germany (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 22 February 1996 amending Decision 93/24/EEC and Decision 93/244/EEC and concerning additional guarantees relating to Aujeszky's disease for pigs destined to regions free of the disease in Germany (Text with EEA relevance) (96/190/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. 'Mecklemburg Vorpommern` is added to Annex I to Decision 93/244/EEC of 2 April 1993, after the word 'Thüringen`.
2. 'Mecklemburg Vorpommern` is added to Annex I to Decision 93/24/EEC of 11 December 1992, after the word 'Brandenburg`.
This Decision shall apply from 1 March 1996.
This decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 February 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No 121, 29. 7. 1964, p. 1977/64.
(2) OJ No L 243, 11. 10. 1995, p. 16.
(3) OJ No L 111, 5. 5. 1993, p. 21.
(4) OJ No L 16, 25. 1. 1993, p. 18.
(5) OJ No L 53, 9. 3. 1995, p. 33.
